name: Aragorn

features.title: Darkvision
features.body: Can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

spells.title: Hunter's Mark
spells.body: Mystically mark a target as your quarry to deal extra damage.

backpack.title: Longsword
backpack.body: Versatile weapon that can deal 1d8 (1d10 if used with both hands) slashing damage.

lorewriteup: Aragorn is the heir to the throne of Gondor. Though he was raised by Elves in secrecy, he is a man destined to greatness, known to the Elves as Estel, meaning 'Hope'.
